full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS MCHOD BDE STONG ROL BA'I GAR MKHAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS MCHOD BDE STONG ROL BA'I GAR MKHAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG RGYAL PA'I KHROD CHEN MO'I DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG SPON BA PA BLO BZANG BKRA @006A *, ,SHIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KHYAB BDAG GANGS RI'I MGON PO MCHOG GI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I BTZUN PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS KYIS CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MI 'GYUR LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG LEGS BSHAD GLING DU SBYAR BA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHID NA MKHAS RNASM KHREL MED PA MED PA ZHU, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
